message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique product that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see that you're willing to pay $150, but I was thinking more along the lines of $160, as I mentioned earlier. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $165.
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I can go up to $155, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at that price?

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go below $170. I'm willing to make a small concession, though - I can meet you at $165, but I need to get closer to my target price. Can you consider that?
I'm not sure I'm willing to go back up to $165, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $155 and $165. How about $160?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob, but I still need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to meet you at $165, but I need to get closer to my target. I can meet you at $168, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
I'm not comfortable going up to $168, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $160 and $168. How about $164?
I'm getting close to my limit, Bob. I can see that we're not too far apart. I'm willing to meet you at $167, but that's as high as I can go. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can only go up to $160, that's the highest I can go. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm afraid I'll have to look elsewhere.
